svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-08-09T13:43:42.536Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/115.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/115.0.1901.183" etag="KST4nTT12gb6Rr9rLW4k" version="21.6.5" type="device"> <diagram id="C5RBs43oDa-KdzZeNtuy" name="Page-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="797" dy="1107" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="1" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-6" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-1" target="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-4"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-1" value="Start Gane" style="ellipse;shape=doubleEllipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="50" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-9" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-3" target="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-8"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-3" value="Accusation Phase" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;absoluteArcSize=1;arcSize=14;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="260" width="140" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-10" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-4" target="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-3"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-4" value="Randomly assign roles to \(N\) players" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;absoluteArcSize=1;arcSize=14;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="160" width="140" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-7" value="Reapeat \( K \) times" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.annotation_2;align=left;labelPosition=right;pointerEvents=1;direction=west;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="300" y="235" width="50" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-19" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-8" target="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-11"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-8" value="Voting Phase" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;absoluteArcSize=1;arcSize=14;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="370" width="140" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-15" value="No" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-11" target="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-17" value="Yes" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-11" target="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-18"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="330" y="510" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-11" value="Is game over?" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="460" width="100" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-13" value="<div style=""><span style="background-color: initial;">Day Phases&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.annotation_1;align=center;pointerEvents=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="235" width="50" height="205" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-23" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-14" target="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-20"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-14" value="Night Phase" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;absoluteArcSize=1;arcSize=14;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="610" width="140" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-18" value="Check Winners" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="480" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-22" value="Yes" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-20" target="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-21"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-25" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-20" target="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-24"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-26" value="No" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-25"> <mxGeometry x="-0.04" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-20" value="Is game over?" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="690" width="100" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-21" value="Werewolves win" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="710" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-24" value="Start a new day" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;absoluteArcSize=1;arcSize=14;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="690" width="100" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-27" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.215;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-24" target="1AoVHM8pQH4bqKBfkke8-13"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="390" y="590" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="440" y="540" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="70" y="279" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
